rows.label: qst105610_msg001
rows.name:
So Luxuria truly was not the
legitimate successor to Adel.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0001
rows.name:
Liberbrant-sensei, you're
here too. Perfect timing.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0002
rows.name: Here, old man. I got the records back.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0003
rows.name: Yes. You have done well.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0004
rows.name:
Liberbrant... You wished to
know the truth, did you not?

rows.label: qst105610_msg0005
rows.name:
Read this... You who taught
me the ancient tongue should
be able to read it.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0006
rows.name: Yes, sir... I shall have a look.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0007
rows.name: Th-This is... No... It cannot be...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0008
rows.name:
The royal family of Luxuria
is not directly descended
from Adel-sama...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0009
rows.name:
Taking advantage of the post-war
chaos... Ugh... Uuu...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0010
rows.name:
That is the truth. In time, I will
make an official announcement.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0011
rows.name: Was it not a sacred bloodline...?

rows.label: qst105610_msg0012
rows.name:
Hey, Liberbrant-sensei. Did
you read that book properly?

rows.label: qst105610_msg0013
rows.name: Yes, every corner of it...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0014
rows.name:
Do you know why our ancestors
started sayin' they were
direct descendants of Adel?

rows.label: qst105610_msg0015
rows.name: That is...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0016
rows.name:
To unite and protect the
people of Iira that Adel
protected... and all of Luxuria.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0017
rows.name:
We may not have inherited
Adel's blood...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0018
rows.name:
But Adel's will is
firmly in our hearts!

rows.label: qst105610_msg0019
rows.name:
What is important is not
blood, but will... Indeed,
that is so, Your Highness.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0020
rows.name:
I was caught up in formality and
was about to forget the essence.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0021
rows.name: So you understand now? Case closed!

rows.label: qst105610_msg0022
rows.name: ...Hehehe. Good, that's good~

rows.label: qst105610_msg0023
rows.name:
What's so funny, Saika? This
ain't the time to laugh.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0024
rows.name:
I was just thinkin' how cool the
Prince is when he gets serious!
I've fallen for you all over again.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0025
rows.name: Wh-! Now's not the time for that!

rows.label: qst105610_msg0026
rows.name: ...Ahem.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0027
rows.name:
Zeke... You have truly
done well in this matter.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0028
rows.name:
...Yeah. And old man, this is the
last time you drop an important key.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0029
rows.name:
Unfortunately, I have no words
to reply... I shall be mindful.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0030
rows.name:
Well then, we're off. You take
care of the rest, old man!

rows.label: qst105610_msg0031
rows.name: Yes. Fare thee well.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0032
rows.name: That we do. Take care, Zeke...
